techmeme.title: Hands-on with macOS 26: the interface is a mess, like a poorly imported iOS design, but the power of Spotlight and Shortcuts will delight many longtime users (Jason Snell/Six Colors)
Starlink says it's experiencing a network outage and is "implementing a solution"; NetBlocks reports that connectivity dropped to "16% of ordinary levels" (Richard Lawler/The Verge)
X is testing using Community Notes to highlight posts that are liked by users with different perspectives (Sarah Perez/TechCrunch)
Hands-on with iOS 26: Liquid Glass is impressive but can also be distracting, Camera redesign is solid, Call Filtering feature in the Phone app is great, more (Dan Moren/Six Colors)
Intel cancelled planned fab projects in Germany and Poland, and will consolidate its testing and assembly operations in Vietnam and Malaysia (Kif Leswing/CNBC)
